title: change online status
body: Is there any way in the new client to change my online status to away or offline so friends list can't see I'm online?

replies.body: Thanks for the info, Roxxe!  Indeed, this is currently being looked into but I don't have any ETA to provide currently.  Hang tight!

https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-reports-eu/f1m2KruN-cant-change-my-online-status-to-away-or-others-only-i-have-that-problem?show=flat

Read Riot Eambo answer :) 
It's bugged. No one can change their status to busy or away. It's a minor bug and they will fix next patch.
